text: Labordia is a genus of plant in family Loganiaceae. There are 16 species all endemic to Hawaii.Motley, T. J. and G. D. Carr. (1998). Artificial hybridization in the Hawaiian endemic genus Labordia. Am J Bot 85:5 654-60. It is closely related to Geniostoma Species include: * Labordia cyrtandrae (Baill.) H.St.John * Labordia degeneri Sherff * Labordia fagraeoidea Gaudich. * Labordia hedyosmifolia Baill. * Labordia helleri Sherff * Labordia hirtella H.Mann * Labordia hosakana (Sherff) W.L.Wagner, D.R.Herbst & Sohmer * Labordia kaalae C.N.Forbes * Labordia lorenciana K.R.Wood, W.L.Wagner & T.Motley * Labordia lydgatei C.N.Forbes * Labordia pumila (Hillebr.) Skottsb. * Labordia sessilis A.Gray * Labordia tinifolia A.Gray var. tinifolia * Labordia tinifolia A.Gray var. lanaiensis Sherff * Labordia tinifolia A.Gray var. wahiawaensis H.St.John * Labordia triflora Hillebr. * Labordia venosa Sherff * Labordia waialealae Wawra * Labordia waiolani Wawra ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Gentianales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Labordia
